thread.title: Jackie Huie
thread.title_full: Peaches Boutique reviewed by Jackie Huie

author: Jackie Huie
title: Jackie Huie
text: For the past several years, my teenage daughter has purchased every gown at PEACHES. The dresses are nothing short of gorgeous, there is a wide selection for every taste and as I overheard one young man put it while there recently, "Who would have known something like this was here?" When you shop at PEACHES, you will try on the most beautiful gowns you have ever seen and feel like a princess. The process can be a little stressful if you aren't ready for it because the girls that work there hustle and truly know what they're doing. I wish every young girl could get a dress from PEACHES.
